name: rage game (AndyGun11)
description:
• HOW TO SURVIVE
  • AIR: Drag the "air" slider up, while it's going down.
  • FEAR: Drag the "fear" slider down, while it's going up.
  • FOOD: Stand directly on top of the burger to gain food.
  • WATER: Stand directly on top of the glass of  water to gain water.

Survive as long as you can!

(maybe even try to get the highscore!)

"Annoying rage game music" (background music) by Yän
